sources.title: Once Upon A Time In Venice | Full Movie | Action Adventure | Bruce Willis
sources.description:
Steve Ford (Bruce Willis) is a down but not out L.A based Private Investigator whose professional and personal worlds collide after his loving pet Buddy is stolen by a notorious gang. A series of crazy circumstances find him doing the gang’s bidding, while being chased by two vengeful Samoan brothers, a loan shark’s goons, and a few other shady characters. They say a dog is a man’s best friend, and Steve shows how far a man will go to be reunited with him.
2017.  Stars: Bruce Willis, John Goodman, Jason Momoa
*Licensed from Voltage Pictures. All rights reserved*

metadata.Plot: In post-World War II Venice, Poirot, now retired and living in his own exile, reluctantly attends a seance. But when one of the guests is murdered, it is up to the former detective to once again uncover the killer.
metadata.Actors: Kenneth Branagh, Michelle Yeoh, Jamie Dornan
